entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
